Prọfesọ Peter Bridgewater (amụrụ ya na 31 Disemba 1945) bụ onye Australia na-echekwa ihe.
Bridgewater gụsịrị nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na botany na Mahadum Durham n'afọ 1967. Ọ nọgidere na-emecha nzere doctorate n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.

Bridgewater bụ onye isi mmụta sayensị nke UK Nature Conservancy Council 1989-1990 na onye isi nchịkwa nke Australian Nature Conservation Agency na onye nduzi nke National Parks and Wildlife Service (1990-1997). Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke UNESCO's Man and the Biosphere Programme na onye nduzi nke ngalaba ya nke sayensị gburugburu ebe obibi afọ 1999 ya n'afọ 2003.
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke International Whaling Commission site n'afọ 1995 ruo 1997. Site n'afọ 2011 ruo afọ 2014 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka prọfesọ nleta na Mahadum United Nations na Japan.
